short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Know what you are clicking in advance! No more clickbaits.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of clicking on links just to realize the actual news didn't have anything to do with the title? This extension gives you a preview of real title of the article. There are three possibilities:
1) SAME: the link text and the article title matches.
2) INCLUDED: the link text is included in the article title.
3) DIFFERENT: is the link text and the article title don't match, the extension shows how much they differ, in %.

It also shows the description of the page (if exists).

Triggers an alert if the link goes to a different domain (fake advertising articles).
